quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: It's not always that we need to do more, but rather that we need to focus on less.
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration; the rest of us just get up and go to work.
author: Stephen King

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Small daily improvements over time lead to stunning results.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent.
author: Unknown

quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Dream big, start small, act now.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Efficiency is doing better what is already being done.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Focus on your goals, not your fear.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you’ll never get it done.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Time is an equal opportunity employer. Each human being has exactly the same number of hours and minutes every day.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
author: Karen Lamb

quote: Simplicity boils down to two steps: Identify the essential. Eliminate the rest.
author: Leo Babauta

quote: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
author: David Allen

quote: The shorter way to do many things is to only do one thing at a time.
author: Mozart

quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
author: David Allen

quote: The way to achieve your goals is to take focused action every single day.
author: Jack Canfield

quote: Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Don’t ruin a good today by thinking about a bad yesterday. Let it go.
author: Unknown

quote: Every day do something that will inch you closer to a better tomorrow.
author: Doug Firebaugh

quote: Your most important work is always ahead of you, never behind you.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Nothing is less productive than to make more efficient what should not be done at all.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Stop doubting yourself. Work hard and make it happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Be stubborn about your goals, but flexible about your methods.
author: Unknown

quote: Done is better than perfect.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: To-do lists are only a reminder of what’s next; focus on what you’re doing now.
author: Unknown
